data.title: Think Privacy 1 1
data.meta_description:
Think Privacy 1 1 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document contains questions and answers related to maintaining privacy and confidentiality of customer data. Some key points:

1) Sensitive customer data should be kept securely under lock and key. Documents containing personal information should not be left unattended and must be securely submitted or stored. 

2) Customer data cannot be shared with unauthorized third parties. Basic customer information may be provided to regulators after verifying their identity. 

3) Maintaining privacy and confidentiality of customer data is the responsibility of the organization and employees. Customer consent is required before sharing their personal information.
